name: gotron
description: Golang & Electron Boilerplate for Platform Independent Desktop Apps
author: equanox

scripts.install: npm run install:app && npm run install:ui:js && npm run install:ui:react && npm run install:ui:typescript && npm run install:ui:vue
scripts.clean: npm run cleandist && del-cli -f app/node_modules && del-cli -f ui/js/node_modules && del-cli -f ui/react/node_modules && del-cli -f ui/typescript/node_modules && del-cli -f ui/vue/node_modules && del-cli -f node_modules || exit 0
scripts.postbuild:js: cpy ui/js/build/*.* app/assets/ && move-cli app/assets/bundle.js app/assets/js/index.js && echo "Build Ui {ui/js}, cp bundle.js to app/assets/js/index.js"
scripts.postbuild:react: cpy ui/react/build/*.* app/assets/ && move-cli app/assets/bundle.js app/assets/js/index.js && echo Build Ui {ui/react}, cp bundle.js to app/assets/js/index.js
scripts.postbuild:typescript: cpy ui/typescript/build/*.* app/assets/ && move-cli app/assets/bundle.js app/assets/js/index.js && echo Build Ui {ui/typescript}, cp bundle.js to app/assets/js/index.js
scripts.postbuild:vue: cpy ui/vue/build/*.* app/assets/ && move-cli app/assets/bundle.js app/assets/js/index.js && echo Build Ui {ui/vue}, cp bundle.js to app/assets/js/index.js
scripts.pack:win: build -w && cross-env-shell GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -tags prod -ldflags -H=windowsgui
scripts.postpack:win: move-cli --mkdirp dist/win-unpacked/ dist/win/electron/ && move-cli gotron.exe dist/win/gotron.exe
scripts.pack:linux: build -l && cross-env-shell GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -tags prod
scripts.postpack:linux: move-cli --mkdirp dist/linux-unpacked/ dist/linux/electron/ && move-cli gotron dist/linux/gotron
scripts.pack:mac: build -m && cross-env-shell GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -tags prod
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build && npm run build:react && npm run build:typescript && npm run build:vue && npm run pack:linux && npm run pack:win && npm run pack:mac
